text:
It would be nice to be able to set an account to a state in which it can't be
used. One could delete the user, but if the reason is only temporary, the user
would have to be recreated and have all permissions assigned back to it. For a
local file user, the password could be changed. However, this doesn't work for
LDAP based accounts, as a Lenya admin can't and shouldn't be changing those
passwords.
